Class com.sun.install.tasks.ProductDependencyTask 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.sun.wizards.core.Task
           |
           +----com.sun.install.tasks.ProductDependencyTask
public class ProductDependencyTask
extends Task
implements Serializable
The ProductDependencyTask is used on upper-level install wizards to remove products or set their default behavior for the installation.

ProductDependencyTask(String)
Create a ProductDependency task that removes products having "true" registered under the remove key.
ProductDependencyTask(String, String)
Create a ProductDependency task that removes products having "true" registered under the remove key and chooses no installation for products having "true" registered under the noInstallKey.
ProductDependencyTask(String, String, String)
Create a ProductDependency task that removes products having "true" registered under the remove key and chooses no installation for products having "true" registered under the noInstallKey.
ProductDependencyTask(String, String, String, String)
Create a ProductDependency task that removes products having "true" registered under the remove key and chooses no installation for products having "true" registered under the noInstallKey.

addRuntimeResources(Vector)
Add the runtime class requirements to the specified vector.
perform()
Perform this Task.
reverse()
Reverse this Task.

ProductDependencyTask 
 public ProductDependencyTask(String removeKey)
Create a ProductDependency task that removes products having "true" registered under the remove key.

Parameters:
removeKey - The key used to determine whether the product should be removed.
ProductDependencyTask 
 public ProductDependencyTask(String removeKey,
                              String noInstallKey)
Create a ProductDependency task that removes products having "true" registered under the remove key and chooses no installation for products having "true" registered under the noInstallKey.

Parameters:
removeKey - The key used to determine whether the product should be removed.
noInstallKey - The key used to determine whether the product should default to no install.
ProductDependencyTask 
 public ProductDependencyTask(String removeKey,
                              String noInstallKey,
                              String defaultInstallKey)
Create a ProductDependency task that removes products having "true" registered under the remove key and chooses no installation for products having "true" registered under the noInstallKey.

Parameters:
removeKey - The key used to determine whether the product should be removed.
noInstallKey - The key used to determine whether the product should default to no install.
defaultInstallKey - The key used to determine whether the product should default to a default install.
ProductDependencyTask 
 public ProductDependencyTask(String removeKey,
                              String noInstallKey,
                              String defaultInstallKey,
                              String customInstallKey)
Create a ProductDependency task that removes products having "true" registered under the remove key and chooses no installation for products having "true" registered under the noInstallKey.

Parameters:
removeKey - The key used to determine whether the product should be removed.
noInstallKey - The key used to determine whether the product should default to no install.
defaultInstallKey - The key used to determine whether the product should default to a default install.
customInstallKey - The key used to determine whether the product should default to a custom install.

perform 
 public void perform()
Perform this Task. This method is used to remove child WizardState objects for products that should not be installed due to a dependency.

Overrides:
perform in class Task
reverse 
 public void reverse()
Reverse this Task.

Overrides:
reverse in class Task
addRuntimeResources 
 public void addRuntimeResources(Vector resourceVector)
Add the runtime class requirements to the specified vector.

Parameters:
resourceVector - The vector containing all the required resources for this wizard.
Overrides:
addRuntimeResources in class Task
